readme: # Riot.js Syntax highlight Atom Syntax highlight for [Riot.js](http://riotjs.com/) `.tag` components. ## install - Via Atom Editor: search for `riot-tag` - Console: `apm install language-riot-tag` ## Emmet - For Emmet compatibility, add the following to your `keymap.cson` file. ``` 'atom-text-editor[data-grammar="text html riot"]:not([mini])': 'tab': 'emmet:expand-abbreviation-with-tab' ``` ## Note - You've got to put your JS / es6 / coffee scripts inside `` tag to get syntax highlights. - `CoffeeScript`, `Sass`, `Scss`, `Less` and `Stylus` highlights should work fine. You need to specify your language on the `type` attribute. e.g. `(
